verses.verse: And I heard <S%G191><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> out of the temple <S%G3485><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> your ways, and pour <S%G1632><s%> out the vials <S%G5357><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And the first <S%G4413><s%> went, <S%G565><s%> and poured <S%G1632><s%> out his vial <S%G5357><s%> on the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and there fell <S%G1096><s%> a noisome <S%G2556><s%> and grievous <S%G4190><s%> sore <S%G1668><s%> on the men <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and on them which worshipped <S%G4352><s%> his image. <S%G1504><s%>

And the second <S%G1208><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632><s%> out his vial <S%G5357><s%> on the sea; <S%G2281><s%> and it became <S%G1096><s%> as the blood <S%G129><s%> of a dead <S%G3498><s%> man: and every <S%G3956><s%> living <S%G2198><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> died <S%G599><s%> in the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And the third <S%G5154><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632><s%> out his vial <S%G5357><s%> on the rivers <S%G4215><s%> and fountains <S%G4077><s%> of waters; <S%G5204><s%> and they became <S%G1096><s%> blood. <S%G129><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the waters <S%G5204><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> righteous, <S%G1342><s%> O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are, <S%G1488><s%> and were, <S%G2258><s%> and shall be, because <S%G3754><s%> you have judged <S%G2919><s%> thus. <S%G5023><s%>

For they have shed <S%G1632><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of saints <S%G40><s%> and prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and you have given <S%G1325><s%> them blood <S%G129><s%> to drink; <S%G4095><s%> for they are worthy. <S%G514><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> another <S%G243><s%> out of the altar <S%G2379><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> Even <S%G3483><s%> so, <S%G3483><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> true <S%G228><s%> and righteous <S%G1342><s%> are your judgments. <S%G2920><s%>

And the fourth <S%G5067><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632><s%> out his vial <S%G5357><s%> on the sun; <S%G2246><s%> and power was given <S%G1325><s%> to him to scorch <S%G2739><s%> men <S%G444><s%> with fire. <S%G4442><s%>

And men <S%G444><s%> were scorched <S%G2739><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> heat, <S%G2738><s%> and blasphemed <S%G987><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> plagues: <S%G4127><s%> and they repented <S%G3340><s%> not to give <S%G1325><s%> him glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And the fifth <S%G3991><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632><s%> out his vial <S%G5357><s%> on the seat <S%G2362><s%> of the beast; <S%G2342><s%> and his kingdom <S%G932><s%> was full of darkness; <S%G4656><s%> and they gnawed <S%G3145><s%> their tongues <S%G1100><s%> for pain, <S%G4192><s%>

And blasphemed <S%G987><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of their pains <S%G4192><s%> and their sores, <S%G1668><s%> and repented <S%G3340><s%> not of their deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And the sixth <S%G1623><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632><s%> out his vial <S%G5357><s%> on the great <S%G3173><s%> river <S%G4215><s%> Euphrates; <S%G2166><s%> and the water <S%G5204><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> was dried <S%G3583><s%> up, that the way <S%G3598><s%> of the kings <S%G935><s%> of the east <S%G395><s%> might be prepared. <S%G2090><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> frogs <S%G944><s%> come out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the dragon, <S%G1404><s%> and out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the beast, <S%G2342><s%> and out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the false <S%G5578><s%> prophet. <S%G5578><s%>

For they are the spirits <S%G4151><s%> of devils, <S%G1142><s%> working <S%G4160><s%> miracles, <S%G4592><s%> which go <S%G1607><s%> forth <S%G1607><s%> to the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and of the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G3625><s%> to gather <S%G4863><s%> them to the battle <S%G4171><s%> of that great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> as a thief. <S%G2812><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he that watches, <S%G1127><s%> and keeps <S%G5083><s%> his garments, <S%G2440><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> he walk <S%G4043><s%> naked, <S%G1131><s%> and they see <S%G991><s%> his shame. <S%G808><s%>
And he gathered <S%G4863><s%> them together <S%G4863><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> tongue <S%G1447><s%> Armageddon. <S%G717><s%>

And the seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632><s%> out his vial <S%G5357><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the air; <S%G109><s%> and there came <S%G1831><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> out of the temple <S%G3485><s%> of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> from the throne, <S%G2362><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> It is done. <S%G1096><s%>

And there were voices, <S%G5456><s%> and thunders, <S%G1027><s%> and lightning; <S%G796><s%> and there was a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> such <S%G3634><s%> as was not since <S%G575><s%> <S%G3739><s%> men <S%G444><s%> were on the earth, <S%G1093><s%> so <S%G5082><s%> mighty <S%G5082><s%> an earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> great. <S%G3173><s%>

And the great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> was divided <S%G1096><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> parts, <S%G3313><s%> and the cities <S%G4172><s%> of the nations <S%G1484><s%> fell: <S%G4098><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> came <S%G3415><s%> in remembrance <S%G3415><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> to her the cup <S%G4221><s%> of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the fierceness <S%G2372><s%> of his wrath. <S%G3709><s%>
And every <S%G3956><s%> island <S%G3520><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> away, and the mountains <S%G3735><s%> were not found. <S%G2147><s%>

And there fell <S%G2597><s%> on men <S%G444><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> hail <S%G5464><s%> out of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> every stone about <S%G5613><s%> the weight <S%G5006><s%> of a talent: <S%G5006><s%> and men <S%G444><s%> blasphemed <S%G987><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of the plague <S%G4127><s%> of the hail; <S%G5464><s%> for the plague <S%G4127><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> was exceeding <S%G4970><s%> great. <S%G3173><s%>
